document.full_text: in the small alabama town of phil campbell, where a tornado killed 20 people and wiped out 40 percent of the homes, church services went on  sunday amid the destruction and loss.
document.title: tornado-hit alabama town copes with destruction, loss
lines_and_colors: in the small alabama town of phil campbell, where a tornado killed 20 people and wiped out 40 percent of the homes, church services went on  sunday amid the destruction and loss.
